ecommerce_app.asgi module

ASGI config for ecommerce_app project.

It exposes the ASGI callable as a module-level variable named application.

For more information on this file, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/howto/deployment/asgi/

ecommerce_app.settings module

Django settings for ecommerce_app project.

Generated by ‘django-admin startproject’ using Django 5.2.10.

For more information on this file, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/topics/settings/

For the full list of settings and their values, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/ref/settings/

ecommerce_app.urls module

URL configuration for ecommerce_app project.

The urlpatterns list routes URLs to views. For more information please see: https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/topics/http/urls/

Examples:

Function views:

from my_app import views
path('', views.home, name='home')

Class-based views:

from other_app.views import Home
path('', Home.as_view(), name='home')

Including another URLconf:

from django.urls import include, path
path('blog/', include('blog.urls'))
ecommerce_app.urls.home(request)[source]

Render the homepage.

Parameters:

request – Django HttpRequest.

Returns:

Rendered homepage.
